img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8b/Wukong_Pagoda_63.jpg)
Once you reach the fourth level, the escape from this hell is closer than ever, but there's still one last stretch to cover.
img_below_text:
Head outside the cells slowly, and you can poke a Blade Monk on the outside off the ledge he's standing on the edge of.
![Wukong Pagoda 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Wukong_Pagoda_66.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a tense moment in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist is engaged in combat against a formidable enemy, likely a Blade Monk, near a large, ornate structure resembling a pagoda. This scene occurs as the player progresses through the fourth level, nearing the escape from a challenging area. The image captures the intensity of the battle, highlighting the protagonist's struggle to overcome obstacles and adversaries in the final stretch of this level.
